
-----title

id='poem_sentence_4_536565'>绕坛古树郁嵯峨，六月吹霜作寒绿。<div id='poem_sentence_4_536565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536565'>折杨黄华不须道，别鹤离鸾尚堪续。<div id='poem_sentence_5_536565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_536565'>君不见开元天子醉西都，音声十院留欢娱。<div id='poem_sentence_6_536565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536569'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536569'>吾诗如清风，去留不可期。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536569'>山房光焰在，实藉众木枝。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536569'>斯言可三复，如我清风诗。<div id='poem_sentence_4_536569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536569'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_536570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536570'>子如求数君，慎莫怪蟊贼。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536570'>胸怀但明了，几案付尘黑。<div id='poem_sentence_4_536570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536570'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_536571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536571'>人生嗜好异，至有海上夫。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536802' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536802?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄赵十弟</a><span class='authorDate'>（1124年）</span><span id='poem_sentence_4_536802_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_536803' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536803' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536803?labeling=true' href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536803")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_536803_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536803'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536803'>两章后来秀，头角固崭然。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536803'>但语强弩末，不争驽马先。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536803'>寓言有十九，曲礼至三千。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536803'>所要在守节，末言能与权<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536803'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_536803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_536803'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_536803_0'>⑴ 自注：世之学者忘近而趋远，急近而升高，虚词大言，行不适实。虽始就学，则先言言不必信，行不必果，达节行权由仁义行。而不知言必信，行必果，守节共学行仁义之为先务也，故修其身。荒唐缪悠之说施之于事，则颠倒悖乱而卒无所正也。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_536803_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_536804' id='poem_sentence_4_536804_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_536804'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_536804_0'>⑴ 自注：颜平仲，石子植，汪信民，饶德操。</div></div></div><div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536824' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536824?labeling=true' target='_blank'>湘水</a><span class='authorDate'>（1124年）</span><span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1127&endYear=1127')">1127年</a>　在汴京围城中，初春，有诗纪事。作品：《读易》《城中纪事》<div id='poem_536895' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536895' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536895?labeling=true' target='_blank'>城中纪事</a><span class='authorDate'>（1127年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536895")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_536895_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536895'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536895'>生平足艰窘，可叹不可言。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536895'>两遭重城闭，再因群盗奔。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536895'>今兹所值遇，我岂不与闻。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536895'>脱身保儿女，恐辜明主恩。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536895'>傍徨不忍去，敢计生理存。<div id='poem_sentence_4_536895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536895'>昨者城破日，贼烧东郭门。<div id='poem_sentence_5_536895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_536895'>中夜半天赤，所忧惊至尊。<div id='poem_sentence_6_536895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_536895'>是日雪正作，疾风飘大云。<div id='poem_sentence_7_536895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_536895'>十室九经盗，巨家多见焚。<div id='poem_sentence_8_536895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_536895'>至今驰道中，但行塞马群。<div id='poem_sentence_9_536895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_536895'>翠华久不返，魏阙横烟氛。<div id='poem_sentence_10_536895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_536895'>都人向天泣，欲语声复吞。<div id='poem_sentence_13_536895'>剥床供晨炊，两眼烟已昏。<div id='poem_sentence_13_536895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_536895'>岂无好少年，可与共殊勋。<div 原校：一作相期下江海，不敢厌荆蛮。远树出头角，诸峰明髻鬟。与辞肥马健，且（原作目，据四库本改）就小船跧。松子犹堪拾，梅梢或许攀。不须阳翟路，咫尺自箕山。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_536702_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1116&endYear=1116')">1116年</a>　在济阴，秋冬间，有诗。作品：《陵城歌（曹州城北十里有陵城坡冢累然即定陶恭王丁傅陵也余往来过之伤嗟再三因为作歌）》<div id='poem_536704' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536704' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536704?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陵城歌<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1116年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536704")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_2_536716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536716'>妻子见驱迫，低头言作官。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536683'>看朱成碧有底忙，然萁煮豆相煎急。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年</a>　初秋，将离曹南，有诗写怀。作品：《将去曹南连得江晁书因叹存殁诸友遂成长韵》《精卫诗》<div id='poem_536722' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536722' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536722?labeling=true' target='_blank'>将去曹南连得江晁书因叹存没诸友遂成长韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536722")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_536722_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536722'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536722'>西风脱残暑，我病不自聊。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536722'>吏舍少还往，亦复长蓬蒿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536722'>欣然脱帽去，念此非一朝。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536722'>阳翟未遽往，宁陵虚见招。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536722'>初无食息地，未免柴水劳。<div id='poem_sentence_4_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536722'>故人数遗书，尚有江与晁。<div id='poem_sentence_5_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_536722'>穷途感节义，俗耳受风骚。<div id='poem_sentence_6_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_536722'>向来相知人，昔盛今寂寥。<div id='poem_sentence_7_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_536722'>落日送汪谢，荒小留老饶。<div id='poem_sentence_8_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_536722'>关侯最杰立，亦以膏自烧。<div id='poem_sentence_9_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_536722'>后生有向子，更尽儿女娇。<div id='poem_sentence_10_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_536722'>出门天夺之，不令上云霄。<div id='poem_sentence_11_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_536722'>坐看朋友泪，未减春秋褒。<div id='poem_sentence_12_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_536722'>怪我但羸疾，误蒙风雨摇。<div id='poem_sentence_13_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_536722'>日月费奔走，文章勤琢雕。<div id='poem_sentence_14_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_536722'>会须领妻子，更欲投吾曹。<div id='poem_sentence_15_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_536722'>耆旧唤归隐，诸公怜久要<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_536722'>出同赴鸡黍，归但守箪瓢。<div id='poem_sentence_17_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_536722'>相将访云山，所至杂渔樵。<div id='poem_sentence_18_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_536722'>还当古渡口，卧听西江潮。<div id='poem_sentence_19_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_536722'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_536722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_536722'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_16_536722_0'>⑴ 自注：刘丈器之及颜平仲、向伯恭、韩秉则诸人，皆相约为一州之隐，以便往还讲习之益。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_536722_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_536723' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536723' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536723?labeling=true' target='_blank'>精卫诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536723")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_536723_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536723'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536723'>西山有鸟，其状如乌。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536723'>名曰精卫，其名自呼。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536723'>精卫堙海，不堙不止。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536723'>问谁之报，云帝之子。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536723'>帝子女娃，往游不还。<div id='poem_sentence_4_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536723'>精卫求之，不敢有安。<div id='poem_sentence_5_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_536723'>海流不改，汝堙不迁。<div id='poem_sentence_6_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_536723'>嗟哉精卫，志则可怜。<div id='poem_sentence_7_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_536723'>我昔读书，惟圣之求。<div id='poem_sentence_8_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_536723'>竭力从之，以春及秋。<div id='poem_sentence_9_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_536723'>老人宴居，审吾之学。<div id='poem_sentence_10_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_536723'>惟时友朋，日就雕琢。<div id='poem_sentence_11_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_536723'>圣言甚微，吾意则近。<div id='poem_sentence_12_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_536723'>近以识微，退或有进。<div id='poem_sentence_13_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_536723'>三年于曹，惟罪之恐。<div id='poem_sentence_14_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_536723'>人虽甚厌，子亦不勇。<div id='poem_sentence_15_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_536723'>舒舒其云，沄沄其水。<div id='poem_sentence_16_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_536723'>子不与归，而曰有以。<div id='poem_sentence_17_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_536723'>豕羊在牢，刍秣之恋。<div id='poem_sentence_18_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_536723'>烹庖及之，抑又谁怨。<div id='poem_sentence_19_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_536723'>予学日远，子道日疏。<div id='poem_sentence_20_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_536723'>有愧精卫，其谁与居。<div id='poem_sentence_21_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_536723'>精卫之飞，不必戾天。<div id='poem_sentence_22_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_536723'>子之不如，宁有智焉。<div id='poem_sentence_23_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_536723'>惟作与否，愚智之择。<div id='poem_sentence_24_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_536723'>小人作诗，惟一劝百。<div id='poem_sentence_25_536723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_536723'></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_536723_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年11月1日</a>　在曹南，十一月一日，有诗。作品：《十一月一日步河堤上》<div id='poem_536725' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536725' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536725?labeling=true' target='_blank'>十一月一日步河堤上</a><span id='poem_sentence_4_536725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536725'>游鱼著钩饵，舟子快新煮。<div id='poem_sentence_5_536725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_536725'>煮鱼得放饭，尚叹行役苦。<div id='poem_sentence_6_536725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_536725'>江湖平生心，岁月可逆数。<div id='poem_536586' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536586' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536586?labeling=true' id='poem_content_536586'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536586'>今日杀一羊，明日杀一猪。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536586'>问神何所乐，而必为此欤。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536586'>羊死噤无声，猪死足号呼。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536586'>伤哉鸭与鹅，闭目颈已朱。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_536586'>江船一帆风，江田一犁雨。<div id='poem_sentence_6_536586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_536586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_536586'>何须污刀几，而后羞鼎俎。<div id='poem_sentence_9_536586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_536586'>于物固无怨，于神亦无苦。<div id='poem_sentence_10_536586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_536586'>更令呜呜歌，时送坎坎鼓。<div id='poem_content_536730'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536730'>爱山不能归，常恐山怪责。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536730_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_536730_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年</a>　是年，在济阴，为龚彦承题壁画作诗。作品：《画马图》<div id='poem_536731' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536731' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536731?labeling=true' target='_blank'>画马图</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536731")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_0_536731_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536731'>秋云欲坠<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作堕）</span>都护垒，急雪暗下屯田营。<div id='poem_sentence_8_536731_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_536731'>同时战士今不归，曹霸弟子能神奇。<div id='poem_sentence_9_536731_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_536731'>毫端妙处君得之，驽骀往来空尔为。<div id='poem_sentence_10_536731_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_536731'></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_536431'>何知珊瑚树，却倚尘埃中。<div id='poem_sentence_5_536431_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_536431'>晁侯夙所敬，见渠如见公。<div id='poem_sentence_8_536431'>同会得玉郎，敲门夜相从。<div id='poem_sentence_8_536431_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_536431'>殷勤一杯酒，目送西归鸿。<div 淮安（山阳）

<div class='label1' id='ffec6c1cd63f4346be6b2cb993f44171_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ffec6c1cd63f4346be6b2cb993f44171");'><span id='ffec6c1cd63f4346be6b2cb993f44171_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年</a>，25岁</div><div id='ffec6c1cd63f4346be6b2cb993f44171' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年</a>　春间赴真州省父，途经楚州，遇汪革、洪炎，会饮甚乐，有诗。作品：《山阳宝应道中与汪信民兄弟洪玉父杜子师张益中日夕过从自过高邮不复有此乐也因作此诗寄怀》<div id='poem_536408' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536408' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536408?labeling=true' target='_blank'>山阳宝应道中与汪信民兄弟洪玉父杜子师张益中日夕过从自过高邮不复有此乐也因作此诗寄怀</a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536408")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_536408_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536408'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536408'>日日南风沙打围，挂帆端为故人回。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536408'>长空渺渺水无际，远树冥冥花自开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536408'>疾病久辜鹦鹉杓，江山稍近凤凰台。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536408'>月明雪霁山阴道，尚想王郎乘兴来<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536408'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_536408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_536408'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_536408_0'>⑴ 自注：李太白有鹦鹉杯、鸬鹚杓，二物名虽异，其用则一也。故得借用，亦以发诸公一笑。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_536408_comment'></div></div><br /></div>

仪征

id='poem_sentence_4_536580_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536580'>脱身尘垢中，一笑终不坏。<div id='poem_sentence_5_536580_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 扬州（江都）

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1113&endYear=1113')">1113年</a>　是年，在邵伯路中有诗，姑系于此。作品：《邵伯路中途遇前纲载末利花甚众舟行甚急不得细观也又有小盆榴等皆精妙竒靡之观因成二绝》其一。《邵伯路中逢御前纲载末利花甚众舟行甚急不得细观也又有小盆榴等皆精妙竒靡之观因成二绝》其二。<div id='poem_536656' id='poem_sentence_12_536651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_536651'>惟昔交朋聚，相期文字盟。<div id='poem_sentence_13_536651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_536651'>笔头传活法，胸次即圆成。<div id='poem_sentence_14_536651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_536651'>孔剑犹霄鍊，隋珠有夜明。<div id='poem_sentence_15_536651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_536651'>英华仰前辈，廓落到诸卿。<div id='poem_sentence_16_536651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_536651'>敢计千金重，尝叨一字荣。<div id='poem_sentence_17_536651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_536651'>因观剑器舞，复悟担夫争。<div id='poem_sentence_18_536651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_536651'>物固藏妙理，世谁能独亨。<div id='poem_sentence_19_536651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_536651'>乾坤在苍莽，日月付峥嵘。<div id='poem_sentence_20_536651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_536651'>凛凛曹刘上，容容沈谢并。<div id='poem_sentence_21_536651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_536651'>直须用款款，未可笑平平。<div id='poem_sentence_22_536651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_536651'>有弟能知我，他年肯过兄。<div id='poem_sentence_23_536651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_536651'>初非强点灼，略不费讥评。<div id='poem_sentence_24_536651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_536651'>短句箜篌引，长歌偪侧行。<div id='poem_sentence_25_536651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_536651'>力探加润泽，极取更经营。<div id='poem_sentence_26_536651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_536651'>径就波澜阔，勿求盆盎清。<div id='poem_sentence_27_536651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_536651'>吾衰足欿㙳，汝大不攲倾。<div id='poem_sentence_28_536651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_536651'>莫以东南路，而无伊洛声。<div id='poem_sentence_29_536651_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_536651'></div><div id='poem_sentence_30_536651_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　秋日，在扬州，有诗。作品：《记夜》《夜坐》<div id='poem_536652' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536652' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536652?labeling=true' target='_blank'>记夜</a><span class='authorDate'>（1114年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536652")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_536652_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536652'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536652'>残暑薰炙人，安梦不得长。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536652'>忽蒙千里风，慰此六尺床。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536652'>高梧舞清影，上悬明月光。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536652'>初知枕簟稳，未厌尘土忙。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536652'>中宵有臭虫，其大如蛣蜣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_536652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536652'>排闼触屏帐，怒欲凌空翔。<div id='poem_sentence_5_536652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_536652'>熟视不得名，但见两翼张。<div id='poem_sentence_6_536652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_536652'>本草所不载，尔雅所未详。<div id='poem_sentence_7_536652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_536652'>夏虫盛百族，此物尤猖狂。<div id='poem_sentence_8_536652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_536652'>东窗不得睡，幸无疾病妨。<div id='poem_sentence_9_536652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_536652'>惜哉有知物，点污此微凉。<div id='poem_sentence_10_536652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_536652'>人生要更事，美恶无不尝。<div id='poem_sentence_11_536652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_536652'>悉除粪壤念，顿悟服食方。<div id='poem_sentence_12_536652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_536652'>去为千丈松，凛然冲雪霜。<div id='poem_sentence_13_536652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_536652'>慎勿学瓜瓠，置身篱落傍。<div id='poem_sentence_14_536652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_536652'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_536652_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1114&endYear=1114')">1114年</a>　秋，在扬州登平山堂，有诗，姑系于此。作品：《同狼山印老早饭建隆遂登平山堂》<div id='poem_536670' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536670' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536670?labeling=true' target='_blank'>同狼山印老早饭建隆遂登平山堂</a><span id='poem_sentence_1_536670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536670'>僮奴懒不进，颇复费呵叱。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536670'>道人先我行，宴坐已一室。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536670'>殷勤劝客住，午饭当促膝。<div id='poem_sentence_4_536670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536670'>炉烟窗纸明，鸟语树叶密。<div id='poem_sentence_5_536670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_536670'>却上平山堂，晚景更萧瑟。<div id='poem_sentence_6_536670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_536670'>澄江渺天际，妙句不容乞。<div id='poem_sentence_7_536670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_536670'>平生泉石念，固自有遗失。<div id='poem_sentence_8_536670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 高邮

"poem_title_536599")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_536599_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536599'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536599'>坐怀长河冰，未尽暍饮状。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536599'>甚憎食案蝇，意欲不相让。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536599'>旱苗乾欲死，蒲藕秋可望。<div id='poem_sentence_4_536599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536599'>平生投笔手，中有无尽藏。<div id='poem_sentence_5_536599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_536599'>尔来夜深藏，稳着犊鼻上。<div id='poem_sentence_6_536599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_536599'>有如三年艾，更复加百壮。<div id='poem_sentence_7_536599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_536599'>黑云翻日脚，好雨终不放。<div id='poem_sentence_8_536599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_536599'>雷声无事来，殷殷车百两。<div id='poem_sentence_9_536599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_536599'>东街暴泥龙，西街设铜像。<div id='poem_sentence_10_536599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_536599'>利害有不同，未易相得丧。<div id='poem_sentence_11_536599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_536599'>农夫责催租，日夕困大杖。<div id='poem_sentence_12_536599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_536599'>那知清歌前，把酒有馀量。<div id='poem_sentence_13_536599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_536599'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_536599_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

color: gray;'>▪</span>暮春，过经新郑，有诗。作品：《新郑路中》<div id='poem_536834' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536834' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536834?labeling=true' target='_blank'>新郑路中</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536834")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_536834_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536834'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536834'>柳絮飞时与君别，南楼把酒看新月。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536834'>月似当年离别时，柳絮随君何处飞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536834'>落花寂寂长安路，陌上十人九人去。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536834'>准拟归鸿寄得书，回头已失秦州树。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536834'>丈夫薄情多可念，尔独何心守贫贱。<div id='poem_sentence_4_536834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536834'>劝君以金屈卮，赠君以长短歌。<div id='poem_sentence_5_536834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_536834'>城南城北春草多，明月如此奈愁何。<div id='poem_sentence_6_536834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_536834'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_536834_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>暮春，离新郑，有诗。作品：《离新郑》<div id='poem_536835' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536835' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536835?labeling=true' target='_blank'>离新郑</a><span class='authorDate'>（1122年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536835")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_536835_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536835'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536835'>荒村更柳色，节物近清明。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536835'>去国三年恨，还家一日程。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536835'>故人投晓别，骡马傍山行。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536835'>何事逢寒食，春来苦要饧。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536835'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_536835_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
宁陵

-----title
曹县（楚丘）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='9a73f719b9384a6199dcf9333333242c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9a73f719b9384a6199dcf9333333242c");'><span id='9a73f719b9384a6199dcf9333333242c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1117&endYear=1117')">1117年</a>，34岁</div><div id='9a73f719b9384a6199dcf9333333242c' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>是年，过楚丘，拜其姑与表弟赵柟。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>是年，过楚丘，与其姑和表弟赵柟别后，有诗。作品：《初别清源姑才仲弟过楚丘作》<div id='poem_536620' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536620' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536620?labeling=true' target='_blank'>初别清源姑才仲弟过楚丘作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536620")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_536620_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536620'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536620'>前村后村鸠乱鸣，梨花点雪柳半青。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536620'>断云忽过楚丘县，骤雨已见龙丘亭。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536620'>故人愁绪各南北，宿酒别时同醉醒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536620'>语离情绪乃如此，故园可归公不听。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536620'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_536620_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>是年，过楚丘，有诗怀颜歧、赵柟。作品：《宿楚丘怀石子植颜平仲赵才仲》<div id='poem_536621' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536621' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536621?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宿楚丘怀石子植颜平仲赵才仲</a><span class='authorDate'>（1117年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536621")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_536621_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536621'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536621'>暮行楚丘北，适与寒雨值。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536621'>旅舍一尺泥，又乏刍秣费。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536621'>故人渺天涯，客子初夜至。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536621'>披衣附残火，煮茗当晚馈。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536621'>昏昏傍晚枕，悄悄入清睡。<div id='poem_sentence_4_536621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536621'>向来谈笑声，已若异世事。<div id='poem_sentence_5_536621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_536621'>但觉舌本间，尚有宿酒味。<div id='poem_sentence_6_536621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_536621'>鸿鹄乘秋风，意在网罗外。<div id='poem_sentence_7_536621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_536621'>强饭无多谈，此语敢失坠。<div id='poem_sentence_8_536621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_536621'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_536621_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
韩城
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='3e83fbc2fe654f2499079ecc4d8a45ef_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("3e83fbc2fe654f2499079ecc4d8a45ef");'><span id='3e83fbc2fe654f2499079ecc4d8a45ef_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1121&endYear=1121')">1121年</a>，38岁</div><div id='3e83fbc2fe654f2499079ecc4d8a45ef' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>是年，避乱至韩城。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在韩城，初秋，闻方腊乱平，有诗。作品：《闻南寇巳平欢快之甚作诗五十韵》<div id='poem_536837' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536837' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536837?labeling=true' target='_blank'>闻南寇已平欢快之甚作诗五十韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1121年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536837")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_536837_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536837'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536837'>日月开南极，山河拱上都。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536837'>圣朝频决胜，贼党莫狂图。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536837'>驿道传烽燧，官军下舳舻。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536837'>弄兵心已壮，渫血气犹粗。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536837'>腊月杭州破，驩声歙县屠。<div id='poem_sentence_4_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536837'>迹虽连劲越，势欲动全吴。<div id='poem_sentence_5_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_536837'>剑戟排空上，刍粮夹路输。<div id='poem_sentence_6_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_536837'>予方在衰杖，意不保头颅。<div id='poem_sentence_7_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_536837'>岂谓除关传，都非验汉符。<div id='poem_sentence_8_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_536837'>坐看前乘没，谁救左轮朱。<div id='poem_sentence_9_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_536837'>守将仍安枕，乡豪肯弃躯。<div id='poem_sentence_10_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_536837'>百川归巨浸，一命仰洪炉。<div id='poem_sentence_11_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_536837'>抚事思同辈，低头失壮夫。<div id='poem_sentence_12_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_536837'>风雷蛰龙卧，名字列仙臞。<div id='poem_sentence_13_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_536837'>遇寇来淮口，迎家傍海隅。<div id='poem_sentence_14_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_536837'>未随霜雪死，甘伴甲裳趋。<div id='poem_sentence_15_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_536837'>每有妻孥问，宁知道里虞。<div id='poem_sentence_16_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_536837'>荒城补泥土，旱水著菰蒲。<div id='poem_sentence_17_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_536837'>交友多流寓，人烟乍有无。<div id='poem_sentence_18_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_536837'>相逢可恸哭，掩泪只长吁。<div id='poem_sentence_19_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_536837'>羽檄迹锋<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作风）</span>数，江船取路迂。<div id='poem_sentence_20_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_536837'>艰难脱纷扰，润泽到焦枯。<div id='poem_sentence_21_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_536837'>屡辱分金送，兼容折简呼。<div id='poem_sentence_22_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_536837'>同群见鸑鷟，猛兽伏于菟。<div id='poem_sentence_23_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_536837'>往往投僧饭，时时就客厨。<div id='poem_sentence_24_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_536837'>苦留春骀荡，勤对色敷腴。<div id='poem_sentence_25_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_536837'>不有沟中断，其如屋上乌。<div id='poem_sentence_26_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_536837'>身犹访安佚，意独离囚拘。<div id='poem_sentence_27_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_536837'>行李催归疾，生涯与旧殊。<div id='poem_sentence_28_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_536837'>裹粮违战地，举足值穷途。<div id='poem_sentence_29_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_536837'>误厌韩城僻，虚随颍水纡。<div id='poem_sentence_30_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_536837'>旧书犹酱瓿，破屋但绳枢。<div id='poem_sentence_31_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_536837'>蒋诩空三径，杨雄更一区。<div id='poem_sentence_32_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_536837'>生平从学圃，老复厌为儒。<div id='poem_sentence_33_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_536837'>爱草骑驴稳，看云借杖扶。<div id='poem_sentence_34_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_536837'>几年供坎廪，尽室付崎岖。<div id='poem_sentence_35_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_536837'>触热医频唤，倾囊酒漫酤。<div id='poem_sentence_36_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_536837'>素冠穷偪仄，白发鬼揶揄。<div id='poem_sentence_37_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_536837'>侧转骥絷足，往还狼跋胡。<div id='poem_sentence_38_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_536837'>疏篱倒禾黍，骤雨落楸梧。<div id='poem_sentence_41_536837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
许昌
-----detail

class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536836'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536836'>溪流浅无声，月色初到竹。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_536836'>明朝寻故人，戏语公一读。<div id='poem_sentence_10_536836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_536836'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_536880'>洛阳年少未宜轻，看子重陈治安策。<div id='poem_sentence_7_536880_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_536880'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_536880_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
登封

宣城

id='poem_sentence_4_536903'>忆昔京城值秋雨，人家邂逅得细语。<div id='poem_sentence_4_536903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536903'>不愁归舍少薪米，且喜尊前好宾主。<div id='poem_sentence_5_536903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_536903'>去年君自云中归，隔巷寻君相劳苦。<div id='poem_sentence_6_536903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_536903'>是时强虏<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作弩）</span>在城下，耳犹厌听贼营鼓。<div id='poem_sentence_7_536903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_536903'>岂知丧乱到江南，同向宣城过残暑。<div id='poem_sentence_8_536903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_536903'>晚来一雨天遂凉，便思约君来对床。<div id='poem_sentence_9_536903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_536903'>床前适有新酒熟，君醉可舞吾能狂。<div id='poem_sentence_10_536903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_536903'>醉中谈天亦未妨，回船吴中君勿忙。<div id='poem_sentence_11_536903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_536903'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_536903_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1128&endYear=1128')">1128年</a>　寓宣城，初秋，有赠友人赵彦强诗。作品：《又赠》<div id='poem_536904' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536904' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536904?labeling=true' target='_blank'>又赠</a><span class='authorDate'>（1128年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536904")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_536904_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536904'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536904'>日日住叠嶂，君能同此游。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536904'>黑云才映日，白雨忽穿楼。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536904'>盗贼何时定，溪山且自幽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536904'>炎蒸不须厌，俄顷是新秋。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536904'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_536904_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1128&endYear=1128')">1128年</a>　寓宣城，初秋，有诗。作品：《景德北窗》<div id='poem_536901' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536901' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536901?labeling=true' target='_blank'>景德北窗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1128年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536901")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_536901_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536901'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536901'>云横树阴浓，雨涨溪水白。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536901'>故人唤我出，已度蒸暑厄。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536901'>北窗非不佳，尚苦眼界窄。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536901'>小楼隐床后，自与尘雾隔。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536901'>更怜昭亭山，相向有佳色。<div id='poem_sentence_4_536901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536901'>君能具鸡黍，略不厌须索。<div id='poem_sentence_5_536901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_536901'>我能知子穷，子亦能爱客。<div id='poem_sentence_6_536901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_536901'>人生要如是，一举乃讽百。<div id='poem_sentence_7_536901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_536901'>我病思远引，未塞交友责。<div id='poem_sentence_8_536901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_536901'>便当约诸公，归耕作长策。<div id='poem_sentence_9_536901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_536901'>囊无一钱赢，岁晚会有获。<div id='poem_sentence_10_536901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_536901'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_536901_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1128&endYear=1128')">1128年</a>　晚秋，离宣城赴江西。<br /></div>
-----end

泾县
-----detail

黟县

-----title
祁门

class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536913")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536913'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536913'>去程归雁两悠悠，行到荒山尽上头。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536913_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
景德镇（浮梁）

class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536933'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536933'>浅溪沙碛寒，月白树影疏。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536933_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1129&endYear=1129')">1129年</a>　是年，将至南岳衡山，作诗寄故人。作品：《将至南岳先寄 演公禅师善公华严》<div id='poem_536934' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536934' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536934?labeling=true' target='_blank'>将至南岳先寄演公禅师善公华严</a><span class='authorDate'>（1129年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536934")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_536934_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536934'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536934'>胡马扬尘烽燧作，我行乃在天一角。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536934_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536934'>江西趼足过湖南，本赴郴阳故人约。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536934_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536934'>中途群盗又蜂起，所至往往为囊橐。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536934_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536934'>迟回改路心自笑，隐忍畏事人所薄。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536934_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536934'>不因此去渡湘水，更欲何时到南岳。<div id='poem_sentence_4_536934_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536934'>山中况有二老人，万里同来且安乐。<div id='poem_sentence_5_536934_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_536934'>遥瞻见我应大笑，白须黑面都如昨。<div id='poem_sentence_6_536934_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_536934'>平生故旧几人在，不早从公老丘壑。<div id='poem_sentence_7_536934_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_536934'>自经丧乱可过从，每一思之怀抱恶。<div id='poem_sentence_8_536934_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_536934'>请公更说因地初，一解人间因慧缚。<div id='poem_sentence_9_536934_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_536934'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_536934_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='a238f25f5b994567b0bbce20335bf1ef_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1130&endYear=1130')">1130年5月5日</a>　端午日，北还湖南，有诗寄连州诸友。作品：《端午日北还至斛岭寄连州诸公》<div id='poem_536951' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536951' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536951?labeling=true' target='_blank'>端午日北还至斛岭寄连州诸公</a><span class='authorDate'>（1130年5月5日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536951")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_536951_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536951'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536951'>岭上逢端午，随家更北征。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536951_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536951'>隔村闻贼斗，通夕畏蛇行。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536951_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536951'>厌病初辞瘴，冲泥却胜晴。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536951_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536951'>犹怜昌歜酒，不与故人倾。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536951_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536951'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_536951_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
衡阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='97bba48db13f4435b3ff0ef1bb20d2f6_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("97bba48db13f4435b3ff0ef1bb20d2f6");'><span id='97bba48db13f4435b3ff0ef1bb20d2f6_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1129&endYear=1129')">1129年</a>，46岁</div><div id='97bba48db13f4435b3ff0ef1bb20d2f6' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1129&endYear=1129')">1129年</a>　是年，抵衡州，逢解子中，有诗。作品：《衡州逢解子中别后奉寄》<div id='poem_536971' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536971' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536971?labeling=true' target='_blank'>衡州逢解子中别后奉寄</a><span class='authorDate'>（1129年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536971")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_536971_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536971'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536971'>我来筠水阳，君亦发章贡。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536971'>相逢潇湘门，及此兵未动。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536971'>卧闻羽书驰，起已<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作见）</span>行者众。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536971'>匆匆不及款，尚辱苦语送。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536971'>慨然念平生，相从已如梦。<div id='poem_sentence_4_536971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536971'>交游半生死，所至多罅缝。<div id='poem_sentence_5_536971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_536971'>我衰学不入<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作及）</span>，君亦老未用。<div id='poem_sentence_6_536971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_536971'>熟知一世中，有此九鼎重。<div id='poem_sentence_7_536971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_536971'>子贱则君子，闵子言必中。<div id='poem_sentence_8_536971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_536971'>师门未遽绝，斯文实天奉。<div id='poem_sentence_9_536971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_536971'>别离又几日，坐想发孤讽。<div id='poem_sentence_10_536971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_536971'>衡州逼南岳，湘水寒不冻。<div id='poem_sentence_11_536971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_536971'>颇传江西扰，盗贼已放纵。<div id='poem_sentence_12_536971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_536971'>往从田苏游，此乐不得共。<div id='poem_sentence_13_536971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_536971'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_536971_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='d2e1431f61a146b781383aca7f4b8112_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d2e1431f61a146b781383aca7f4b8112");'><span id='d2e1431f61a146b781383aca7f4b8112_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1133&endYear=1133')">1133年</a>，50岁</div><div id='d2e1431f61a146b781383aca7f4b8112' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1133&endYear=1133')">1133年</a>　春，近衡山，有诗。作品：《送密上人归江西》<div id='poem_536985' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536985' class='poemTitle href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536985")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_536985_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536985'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536985'>轻舟君先行，羸马我已往。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536985'>湖山已在望，南岳行可仰。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536985'>不忧盗贼繁，渐喜草木长。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536985'>密也负奇气，少已离尘网。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536985'>饱参诸方禅，所至被称赏。<div id='poem_sentence_4_536985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536985'>独留末后句，未肯休吾党。<div id='poem_sentence_5_536985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_536985'>经寻卓锥地，更足以自养。<div id='poem_sentence_6_536985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_536985'>囊空脚颇健，体俭心甚广。<div id='poem_sentence_7_536985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_536985'>喜谈江西胜，妙处犹<span id='poem_sentence_9_536985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_536985'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_536985_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

宜章

-----title
阳山
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='bcb815ad7d644b4e96ad6ad5f2ae3a54_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("bcb815ad7d644b4e96ad6ad5f2ae3a54");'><span id='bcb815ad7d644b4e96ad6ad5f2ae3a54_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1130&endYear=1130')">1130年</a>，47岁</div><div id='bcb815ad7d644b4e96ad6ad5f2ae3a54' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1130&endYear=1130')">1130年1月</a>　正月底，奔阳山，有诗。作品：《阳山大雹》<div id='poem_537516' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_537516' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/537516?labeling=true' target='_blank'>阳山大雹</a><span class='authorDate'>（1130年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_537516")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_537516_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_537516'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_537516'>建炎庚戌正月尾，阳山雨雹大如李。<div id='poem_sentence_0_537516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_537516'>疾雷先驱风御随，顷刻云屯遍千里。<div id='poem_sentence_1_537516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_537516'>初疑地轴开九渊，固阴惊蛰神龙起。<div id='poem_sentence_2_537516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_537516'>又恐帝出发震怒，下扫炎荒除疠鬼。<div id='poem_sentence_3_537516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_537516'>破窗穿牖□□横，触石摧林势难比。<div id='poem_sentence_4_537516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_537516'>疑是晓色方窥檐，惨澹复黑迷巾履。<div id='poem_sentence_5_537516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_537516'>披衣欲兴还就枕，𥔀磕崩腾喧两耳。<div id='poem_sentence_6_537516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_537516'>吾君圣德过成康，胡虏凭陵殊未已。<div id='poem_sentence_7_537516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_537516'>中原郡邑半丘墟，铁骑犹思犯南鄙。<div id='poem_sentence_8_537516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_537516'>安得天威假庙谟，恢复两河端可俟。<div id='poem_sentence_9_537516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_537516'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_537516_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1130&endYear=1130')">1130年</a>　二月，在阳山，道中有诗。作品：《阳山道中遇大风雨暴寒有感》<div id='poem_536940' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_536940' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/536940?labeling=true' target='_blank'>阳山道中遇大风雨暴寒有感</a><span class='authorDate'>（1130年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_536940")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_536940_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536940'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536940'>岭南二月春已尽，百花委弃随风吹。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536940'>山前山后绿阴满，已过中原初夏时。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536940'>不知何气忽乖沴<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作戾）</span>，风雨夜作雷乘之。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536940'>鞭笞宇宙敝日月，万象倒错藏光辉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_536940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_536940'>岩倾涧绝水府现，捕搏虎豹擒蛟螭。<div id='poem_sentence_4_536940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_536940'>百围老树不须说，忍冻欲压摧其枝。<div id='poem_sentence_5_536940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_536940'>峥嵘屋瓦走飞雹，如战初合麾旌旗。<div id='poem_sentence_6_536940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_536940'>我行避地更值此，闭目但听儿啼饥。<div id='poem_sentence_7_536940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_536940'>仆夫噤死者数辈，牛马惧不存毛皮。<div id='poem_sentence_8_536940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_536940'>长途三日断还往，况有鸟雀凌云飞。<div id='poem_sentence_9_536940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_536940'>只今胡尘暗江路，盗贼往往乘馀威。<div id='poem_sentence_10_536940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_536940'>良民虽在困须索，四海万里皆疮痍。<div id='poem_sentence_11_536940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_536940'>天公忍不一顾此，反更震动穷荒为。<div id='poem_sentence_12_536940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_536940'>此方亦是神所主，我欲告诉心先疑。<div id='poem_sentence_13_536940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_536940'>明朝风定寒亦解，收召魂魄寻归期。<div id='poem_sentence_14_536940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_536940'>涧毛自可荐筐筥，试出苦语令神知。<div -----title
连州（桂阳）
-----detail

郴州
-----detail

id='poem_sentence_10_537515_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_537515'>插剑郴岸口，泉溢何神奇。<div id='poem_sentence_11_537515_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
全州
-----detail

id='poem_sentence_6_102046'>我行万里厌穷独，疾病未已心先灰。<div id='poem_sentence_6_102046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_102046'>对此不觉三叹息，恐是转侧同南来。<div id='poem_sentence_7_102046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_102046'>异乡久处少意绪，破壁相对无根荄。<div id='poem_sentence_8_102046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_102046'>古来寒士每如此，一世埋没随蒿莱。<div id='poem_sentence_9_102046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_102046'>遁光藏德老不耀，肯与世俗相追陪。<div id='poem_sentence_10_102046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_102046'>轮囷离奇<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作濩落）</span>多见用，牺尊青黄未为灾。<div id='poem_sentence_11_102046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_102046'>含<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>毫吮墨去颜色，况自不必<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>须穿栽。<div id='poem_sentence_12_102046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_102046'>岁穷路远莫惆怅，此去保无蜂蝶猜。<div id='poem_sentence_13_102046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_102046'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_102046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_102046'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_102046_0'>⑴ 以上二字原缺，据四库本补</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_102046_0'>⑵ 自不必三字下至本卷末，底本缺，《四部丛刊》据陈仲鱼藏钞本补，四库本文字与钞本同</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_102046_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
贺州
-----detail

id='poem_sentence_2_536970'>东县陈卿忽叩门，笑语欢然相暖热。<div id='poem_sentence_2_536970_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_536970'>怪我长贫走道路，所至不安宁有说。<div -----title
德庆
-----detail

class='poemContent' id='poem_content_537581'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_537581'>藤江合贺江，浮荡苍梧云。<div id='poem_sentence_0_537581_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_537581_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_537581'>勉哉赤松子，善事黄中君。<div id='poem_sentence_18_537581_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 桂林（临桂）

-----title
祁阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='a6193c5ca92d449889606feb9e03face_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a6193c5ca92d449889606feb9e03face");'><span id='a6193c5ca92d449889606feb9e03face_link' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_536995'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_536995'>五月行人汗如雨，意绪昏昏杂尘土。<div id='poem_sentence_0_536995_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_536995'>浯溪一见中兴碑，便有清风濯烦暑。<div id='poem_sentence_1_536995_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_536995'>中兴之业诚艰难，敢作汉武周宣看。<div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1133&endYear=1133')">1133年</a>　初秋，北还至临川寓居，作《江西诗社宗派图》<div id='poem_1232204' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1232204' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1232204?labeling=true' target='_blank'>江西诗社宗派图序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1133年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_1232204")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1232204_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1232204'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1232204'>古文衰于汉末，先秦古书存者，为学士大夫剽窃之资，五言之妙，与《三百篇》、《离骚》争烈可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1232204_comment'></div>自李、杜之出，后莫能及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1232204_comment'></div>韩、柳、孟郊、张籍诸人，自出机杼，别成一家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1232204_comment'></div>元和之末，无足论者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1232204_comment'></div>衰至唐末极矣，然乐府、长短句，有一唱三叹之音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1232204_comment'></div>至国朝文物大备，穆伯长、尹师鲁始为古文，成于欧阳氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1232204_comment'></div>歌诗至于豫章，始大出而力振之，后学者同作并和，尽发千古之秘，亡馀蕴矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1232204_comment'></div>录其名字曰江西宗派，其原流皆出豫章也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1232204_comment'></div>宗派之祖曰山谷，其次陈师道<span class='inlineComment2'>（无已）</span>、潘大临<span class='inlineComment2'>（邠老）</span>、谢逸<span class='inlineComment2'>（无逸）</span>、洪朋<span class='inlineComment2'>（龟父）</span>、洪刍<span class='inlineComment2'>（驹父）</span>、饶节<span class='inlineComment2'>（德操、乃如壁也）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1232204_comment'></div>祖可、<span class='inlineComment2'>（正平）</span>徐俯<span class='inlineComment2'>（师川）</span>、林修<span class='inlineComment2'>（子仁）</span>、洪炎、<span class='inlineComment2'>（玉父）</span>汪革、<span class='inlineComment2'>（信民）</span>李錞、<span class='inlineComment2'>（希声）</span>韩驹<span class='inlineComment2'>（子苍）</span>、李彭、<span class='inlineComment2'>（商老）</span>晁冲之<span class='inlineComment2'>（叔用）</span>、江端本<span class='inlineComment2'>（子之）</span>、杨符<span class='inlineComment2'>（信祖）</span>、谢迈<span class='inlineComment2'>（幼槃）</span>、夏倪<span class='inlineComment2'>（均父）</span>、林敏功、潘大观、王直方<span class='inlineComment2'>（立之）</span>、善权、<span class='inlineComment2'>（巽中）</span>高荷<span class='inlineComment2'>（子勉）</span>，凡二十五人。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1232204_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1232204'><span class='label'>按：</span>《云麓漫钞》卷一四，涉闻梓旧本。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1232204_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1133&endYear=1133')">1133年9月12日</a>　九月十二日，在临川，为《谢幼槃文集》题跋。作品：《谢幼槃文集跋》<div id='poem_1232205' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1232205' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1232205?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢幼槃文集跋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1133年9月12日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_1232205")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1232205_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1232205'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1232205'>谢康乐诗，规摹宏远，为一时之冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1232205_comment'></div>而元晖诗，清新独出，又自有过人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1232205_comment'></div>后之善言者，于二公盖未敢有所优劣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1232205_comment'></div>本中窃以为无逸诗似康乐，幼槃诗似元晖，此平等之论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1232205_comment'></div>绍兴三年秋，自岭外北还，过临川，去幼槃之没十八年矣，始尽得幼槃书于其子长讷所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1232205_comment'></div>伏读累日，益知前语之不谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1232205_comment'></div>虽然，幼槃与其兄无逸修身厉行，在崇宁、大观间，不为世俗毫发污染，固后进之师也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1232205_comment'></div>其文字之好，盖馀事尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1232205_comment'></div>后之学者，尊其行，并学其文可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1232205_comment'></div>学其文，不究其行，则非二子立言之本志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1232205_comment'></div>九月二十日吕本中书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1232205_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1133&endYear=1133')">1133年</a>　在临川，秋日，与诸僧往还，有赠行诗。作品：《赠一上人》《送元上人归禾山》<div -----title
福建

href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1134&endYear=1134')">1134年</a>　秋，至福建，有诗。作品：《寄题暨尚卿双莲亭》<div id='poem_537028' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_537028' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/537028?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄题暨尚卿双莲亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1134年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_537028")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_537028_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_537028'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_537028'>异亩同颖久未出，双觡共抵复何物。<div id='poem_sentence_0_537028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_537028'>今君何以得此花，和气所致无他术。<div id='poem_sentence_1_537028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_537028'>双莲共蒂中连理，相映同心出秋水。<div id='poem_sentence_2_537028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_537028'>秋水池塘晓自凉，双莲中含风露香。<div id='poem_sentence_3_537028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_537028'>飞燕姊妺<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作弟）</span>不相妒，并骋逸艳来昭阳。<div id='poem_sentence_4_537028_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 福州（怀安）

class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_537043")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_537043_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_537043'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_537043'>远近诸山翠作堆，凤池北望更崔嵬。<div id='poem_sentence_0_537043_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_537043'>青松夹路搀天去，白鸟翻云旁海来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_537043_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_537043'>喜有故人同出郭，属因衰病阻衔杯。<div id='poem_sentence_2_537043_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_537043'>犹怜不赴对床约，独上篮舆日暮回。<div id='poem_sentence_3_537043_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_537043'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_537043_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1135&endYear=1135')">1135年</a>　是年，在福州，有诗题孙子绍藏画。作品：《题孙子绍所藏王摩诘渡水罗汉》<div id='poem_528952' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_528952' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/528952?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题孙子绍所藏王摩诘渡水罗汉</a><span class='authorDate'>（1135年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_528952")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_528952_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_528952'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_528952'>问渠褰裳欲何往，彷徨徙倚沧波上。<div id='poem_sentence_0_528952_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_528952'>至人入水固不濡，何以有此恐怖状。<div id='poem_sentence_1_528952_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_528952'>我知摩诘意未真，欲以笔端调世人。<div id='poem_sentence_2_528952_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_528952'>此水此渡俱非实，摩诘亦未尝下笔。<div id='poem_sentence_3_528952_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_528952'>孙郎宝藏今几年，往来周旋兵火间。<div id='poem_sentence_4_528952_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_528952'>世人险阻更百难，彼渡水者安如山。<div id='poem_sentence_5_528952_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_528952'>请君但作如此观，莫更思维寻笔端。<div id='poem_sentence_6_528952_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_528952'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_528952_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='poemContent' id='poem_content_537048'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_537048'>楞伽室中绝皂白，去天何止<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作未到）</span>三百尺。<div id='poem_sentence_0_537048_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_537048'>只今更住最高峰，斋无木鱼粥无钟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_537048_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_537048'>已将虎兕等蝼蚁，更许蛙蚓同蛟龙。<div id='poem_sentence_2_537048_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_537048'>闻道说禅通一线，为尔不识楞伽面。<div id='poem_sentence_3_537048_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_537048'>一生强项我所知，气压霜皮四十围。<div id='poem_sentence_4_537048_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_537048'>世人未辨此真伪，敢向楞伽论是非。<div id='poem_sentence_5_537048_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_537048'>诸公固是旧所适，郑髯从之新有得。<div id='poem_sentence_6_537048_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_537048'>欲将此意向楞伽，但道鹄乌同一色。<div id='poem_sentence_7_537048_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_537048'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_537048_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1135&endYear=1135')">1135年</a>　是年，在福州，有诗纪事。作品：《会稽石道叟教授南剑兵火抢攘之余兴治郡学吕本中为作诗叙本末云》<div id='poem_537051' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_537051' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/537051?labeling=true' target='_blank'>会稽石道叟教授南剑兵火抢攘之馀兴治郡学尺椽片瓦皆其所自经营也未期月而学成远近赖之又祠前辈贤者以风励多士使游其间者望之而心化由是而入尧舜之道不难也古之教者盖多术矣五帝宪三王有乞言宪贤于乞言也道叟知之矣吕本中为作诗叙本末云</a><span class='authorDate'>（1135年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_537051")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_537051_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_537051'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_537051'>圣远道则微，世久学欲绝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_537051_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_537051'>区区续微言，未易胜邪说。<div id='poem_sentence_1_537051_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_537051'>石侯东南秀，睹此心欲折。<div id='poem_sentence_2_537051_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_537051'>分教南剑州，意在补亡缺。<div id='poem_sentence_3_537051_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_537051'>欻令兵火后，复见俎豆设。<div id='poem_sentence_4_537051_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_537051'>庙貌甚尊严，上下有区别。<div id='poem_sentence_5_537051_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_537051'>先生默无语，风化动闽粤。<div id='poem_sentence_6_537051_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_537051'>斯文自明白，如仰见日月。<div id='poem_sentence_7_537051_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_537051'>坐令穿凿误，不待汤沃雪。<div id='poem_sentence_8_537051_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_537051'>不知旁祠谁，今代古豪杰。<div id='poem_sentence_9_537051_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_537051'>孰能与之齐，共此岁寒节。<div id='poem_sentence_10_537051_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_537051'>入门日在望，未返意已竭。<div id='poem_sentence_11_537051_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_537051'>由来正心术，不在费颊舌。<div id='poem_sentence_12_537051_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_537051'>乃知薰陶功，自与闻见别。<div id='poem_sentence_13_537051_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_537051'>曾鲁颜不愚，亦岂有优劣。<div id='poem_sentence_14_537051_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_537051'>此理倘可求，万古同一辙<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：前辈，谓陈了翁也。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_537051_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_537051'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_537051_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_537057")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_537057_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_537057'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_537057'>闲居病亦侵，世务每绝念。<div id='poem_sentence_0_537057_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_537057'>犹怜二三子，从我久未厌。<div id='poem_sentence_1_537057_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_537057'>书来不改昨，意苦辞亦赡。<div id='poem_sentence_2_537057_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_537057'>问我来何时，期我早会面。<div id='poem_sentence_3_537057_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_537057'>我行但谋食，欲去复未便。<div id='poem_sentence_4_537057_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_537057'>要当相就居，同止山水县。<div id='poem_sentence_5_537057_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_537057'>读我所传书，亦足满素愿。<div id='poem_sentence_6_537057_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_537057'>开卷忽有得，如饮醇酒酽。<div id='poem_sentence_7_537057_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_537057'>吾闻古志士，学也盖有渐。<div id='poem_sentence_8_537057_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_537057'>欲升夫子堂，不摘屈宋艳。<div id='poem_sentence_9_537057_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/537058?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送钱子虚抚干往洪州赴新任二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1135年）</span><span id='poem_sentence_0_537058_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_537058'>经过阅岁月，相伴走江湖。<div id='poem_sentence_1_537058_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_537059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_537059'>闷有书遮眼，闲须笏拄颐。<div id='poem_sentence_2_537059_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_537059_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1135&endYear=1135')">1135年</a>　是年，在福州，有诗。作品：《乾元副寺欲还云门》<div id='poem_537069' id='poem_sentence_4_537108'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_537108_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1136&endYear=1136')">1136年</a>　是年，居福州，有诗寄故人晁谦之乞茶。作品：《寄晁恭道郑德成二漕》<div id='poem_537056' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_537056' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/537056?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄晁恭道郑德成二漕</a><span class='authorDate'>（1136年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_537056")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_537056_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_537056'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_537056'>二年住闽中，不识建溪茶。<div id='poem_sentence_0_537056_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_537056'>处处得残杯，顾未惬齿牙。<div id='poem_sentence_1_537056_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_537056'>饥肠拥滞气，病眼增昏花。<div id='poem_sentence_2_537056_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_537056'>故人持节来，怜我病有加。<div id='poem_sentence_3_537056_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_537056'>会当饷绝品，不但分新芽。<div id='poem_sentence_4_537056_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_537056'>苍壁月堕晓，宝胯金披沙。<div 武夷山（崇安）
-----detail

-----end

-----title
桐庐
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='c4c2b0578e2b414c953115e84dcaa0de_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c4c2b0578e2b414c953115e84dcaa0de");'><span id='c4c2b0578e2b414c953115e84dcaa0de_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1138&endYear=1138')">1138年</a>，55岁</div><div id='c4c2b0578e2b414c953115e84dcaa0de' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1138&endYear=1138')">1138年</a>　仲冬，乘舟沿富春江至桐庐，有诗。作品：《舟行至桐庐》<div id='poem_537141' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_537141' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/537141?labeling=true' target='_blank'>舟行至桐庐</a><span class='authorDate'>（1138年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_537141")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_537141_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_537141'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_537141'>乘舟待潮发，一日到桐庐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_537141_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_537141'>物色寒初甚，溪山画不如。<div id='poem_sentence_1_537141_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_537141'>往来真是梦，亲旧不须书。<div id='poem_sentence_2_537141_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_537141'>犹胜<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作剩）</span>鸱夷在，时容托后车。<div id='poem_sentence_3_537141_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_537141'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_537141_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1143&endYear=1143')">1143年</a>　是年，寓上饶，有诗寄题叶份普光明庵。作品：《叶尚书普光明庵》<div id='poem_537398' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_537398' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1143&endYear=1143')">1143年</a>　寓上饶，初秋，有诗送表弟。作品：《送邢道州赵邵州归湖南》<div id='poem_537408' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_537408' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_537409' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_537409' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/537409?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送方丰之秀才归福唐</a><span id='poem_sentence_4_537409_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_537409'>何以终之，止在不倦。<div id='poem_sentence_5_537409_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_537409'>贫贱勿厌，自然无闷。<div id='poem_sentence_6_537409_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_537409'>富贵勿羡，害德之本。<div id='poem_sentence_7_537409_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_537409'>彼古之人，能圣与仁。<div id='poem_sentence_8_537409_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_537413' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_537413' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/537413?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送晁侍郎知抚州</a><span class='authorDate'>（1143年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25014, "宋", "吕本中", "poem_title_537413")'>吕本中</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_537413_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_537413'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_537413'>与君相从四十载，老病昏昏君不怪。<div id='poem_sentence_0_537413_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_537413'>交游大半在鬼录，一时辈行惟君在。<div id='poem_sentence_1_537413_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_537412_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_537412'>由眼不得明，故视有不正。<div id='poem_sentence_1_537412_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_537412_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_537412'>不能添汝明，但要除此症。<div id='poem_sentence_10_537412_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_537412_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_537412'>皎洁玉壶冰，澄澈秋月莹。<div id='poem_sentence_13_537412_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_537458'>非烟非云断复续，缓步徐行不拘束。<div id='poem_sentence_3_537458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_537458'>断崖一落千丈滑，远望笔行如一发。<div id='poem_sentence_4_537458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_537458'>鬼神竭力觑不见，铁矿消亡网<span class='inlineComment2'>（黄本作钢）</span>作线。<div id='poem_sentence_5_537458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_537458'>线舞飞扬不自由，纵横自在胜银钩。<div id='poem_sentence_6_537458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_537458'>知君此意非安排，妙处不从笔下来。<div id='poem_sentence_7_537458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_537458'>心疑形释万事去，信手却立无纤埃。<div id='poem_sentence_8_537458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_537458'>满堂回头莫见猜，我自悟此忘胸怀。<div id='poem_sentence_9_537458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_537458'>操舟相马在事外，颜氏识此由心斋。<div id='poem_sentence_10_537458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_537458'>如君下笔少有意，锦绣宁不误剪裁。<div id='poem_sentence_11_537458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_537458'>君惟无心故若此，秋毫自可缠风雷。<div id='poem_sentence_12_537458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_537458'>钟王敛手谢不敏，长史怀素惭衰颓。<div id='poem_sentence_13_537458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_537458'>病夫睹此心目开，向来穷愁安在哉<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《东莱先生诗集》卷二○）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_537458_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_537458'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_537458_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1145&endYear=1145')">1145年7月10日</a>　七月十日，居仁卒于信州。<br /></div>
-----end
